resources.string:
This little app here should serve as your best friend in most board or card games. Use it whenever you're lacking a die or you need to count some points.

 	There are 9 slots in the main screen. You can fill each of them with a customized counter or die using the little cog button, which will bring you to the Item Setup screen. There you can also decide to simply remove the item that was previously occupying this slot.

 	Whenever you're on the main screen you can also decide to remove all items by choosing option "reset" in the pop up menu.

 	When creating a new counter you can choose it's name and color.

 	When creating a new die, you can also choose it's name and color, and additionally the range of values that can be rolled with it by specifying the lower and upper bound.
